description: This file defines Express routes for user authentication, including registration, login, profile retrieval, token refresh, and logout. It uses middleware for authentication and references a controller for handling business logic. Additionally, it contains Swagger API documentation annotations for each route.

methods.name: router.post('/register')
methods.description: Handles user registration with POST request to '/auth/register', invoking authController.register.

methods.name: router.post('/login')
methods.description: Handles user login with POST request to '/auth/login', invoking authController.login.

methods.name: router.get('/me')
methods.description: Retrieves current user profile with GET request to '/auth/me', using authenticate middleware.

methods.name: router.post('/refresh')
methods.description: Refreshes JWT access token with POST request to '/auth/refresh', invoking authController.refresh.

methods.name: router.post('/logout')
methods.description: Logs out user with POST request to '/auth/logout', using authenticate middleware, invoking authController.logout.
